By torey luvullo on Friday, December 17, 2004 - 04:46 am:

One excellent fight, and one total annihilation, were the results last night.

The excellent fight was between FoogHale and 2Hot4You. The Hare made a habit of starting each fight with a successful SpringKick to establish a big lead, then settled down to a diet of MiniPunches, as if to toy with his larger opponent. During this time, the Baku would let loose with some mighty vacuums or playing or ear slaps. Anytime one of those hit, it did 300+ damage; anytime two of them hit, the Hare was KO'd.

Bottom line, 3 times, 2Hot landed the two hits he needed. Unfortunately for him, 5 times, Foogy dodged enough to make his mini-punch strategy pay off. He kinda drove his trainer nuts, but in the end, he won 5-3.

Not much needs to be said about Soldier v Mr. Orac. There was such a disparity of tech strength - Mr. Orac's very best techs did 120 damage; everything Soldier threw out there did at least 200, with most doing 300+. No contest here - a 5-0 whitewash.

By Petit-Trot on Friday, December 17, 2004 - 02:02 pm:
